name: W.I.I.Z
description:
Wiiz is a platform game, which is based on a dream, where you need to pick up your tears to follow your path and wake up.

I hope you like it and leave your comment.

AND DO NOT FORGET THE GAME IS IN THE INITIAL STAGE AND MAY CHANGE.

______CONTROLS_____

Do you will be force to make a small and easy level tutorial.

W/A/S/D - To Move  (A/S only in stairs)

Space - To Jump 

Double Space - To Double Jump 

Left Mouse - To Shoot
